group_1.narration: My family has always loved nature,@so our garden is very important to us.

group_1.textLeft: I heard that...the appartment building is@going to be thirty-eight floors high...

group_1.textRight: Thirty-eight floors...?
Thirty-eight floors...?@So then, what's gonna happen...?

group_1.textLeft: Well, if they put up that big of a@building in front of us...
We're not going to get any sunlight@in our house...

group_1.textRight: Huh...?

group_1.textLeft: Then we won't be able to grow anything@in our vegetable garden...

group_1.textRight: No vegetable garden...?@[chara:101101:cheek_1:face_mtn_ex_031.exp.json:motion_001]No...! That can't be...!

group_1.narration: It was such a sad...and painful time...
And then, when I was at my lowest,@the one that appeared before me was...

group_1.textRight: Make a contract with me and become@a magical girl!

group_1.narration: I was told that if I made a wish,@anything that I wanted would come true...

group_1.textLeft: The appartment building!@I want it gone!

group_1.textRight: Appartment building?@Which apartment building?

group_1.textLeft: I want you to make it so that they never started…@[chara:101101:cheek_2:motion_100]...building the building they're building!

group_1.narration: That was how I was able to protect my garden...

group_1.textCenter: So, um, in here it should be fine to@make a wish to Kyubey.

group_1.narration: That's right...@You just have to adjust everything@around you to your convenience...
If you feel uncomfortable,@you can just run away...

group_1.textRight: Right?
That's right.
I'm the other you,@and you're the other me.
No. From here on,@it's not a dream anymore.
Where else could it be?
This place is also a part of “me”.
Talking from within myself,@inside of myself...
It's like that.
Well, you don't have to think too hard@about it.
You can make up whatever excuse you want@to explain how this is happening.
Right?
As for the reason why we're meeting like this...@You want to know, don't you?
...Hmmmhmmm...@It's not that big of a deal...
You were doing whatever you want in@your dream, right?
Sooo…
I want you to keep on living however@you please.
That's right!
Just do whatever's easiest for you!
If something becomes too difficult,@just run away to somewhere else!
Then get back on the easiest path for you@again! That's what I want you to do.
It's fiiiine!
Because living like that is what we're@best at.
